ygData.subject: Re: bone chips?
ygData.msgSnippet: all necros have to avoid (big time) the wizard guild in freeport.  check the map in the manual, and look at where the guild is.  the T intersection RIGHT
ygData.messageBody:
all necros have to avoid (big time) the wizard guild in freeport. check the
map in the manual, and look at where the guild is. the T intersection RIGHT
BEFORE the guild, you HAVE to avoid. dont go into it- there are 2 wizard
guards who love to kill necros. when i was new to freeport i was kos'd
there several times

belphenor


>From: TkAdam@...
>
>In a message dated 5/24/99 1:36:04 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
>mata_eq@... writes:
>
> > Also Does anyone know how the humans will view my Gnome Necro? I got
>my
> > faction up to indifferent w/ the dwarves by killing orcs in CB, but I
>don't
> > know if I can take the boat yet.
> >
>
>Watch yourself in Neriak.... Killing Crushbone orcs give you bad faction
>with
>the Neriak guards.
>
>And the human guards in East and West freeport (NOT NORTH!!!) are corrupt
>and
>should not be KOS... (they arn't to a Dark Elf Necro... and even worse
>combo)
>
>Sonoroud.
